Articles.Content:
I ported over a 1.0.2 career save to 1.0.3 and when I go to the tech tree none of the nodes appear. I have 2 ships with KER modules installed, but I do not have KER or any other mod installed in 1.0.3. Newly created career games show the tech tree. KSP is non-Steam.

[Here](https://www./?qst54oun3zacfli) is the persistent file for the save.

![lJ9g0cE.png](http://i.imgur.com/lJ9g0cE.png)

This is what the R&D building looks like.

EDIT: Issue resolved. For anyone having this issue, it appears to result from missing a ModuleManager techtree file. Regardless of whether or not your current install is modded, ensure you have modulemanager installed on the new version if you're moving saves and the previous was modded. It's apparently not just a parts issue.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-23T15:58:33Z" title="06/23/2015 03:58  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 23, 2015</time> by Jodo42**
